#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(){
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	for(int i=0;i<t;i++){
		long int n;
		cin>>n;
		int answer=n%7;
		long int ans;
		if(n%7==0)
		cout<<n<<endl;
		else{
		 ans=answer;
			while(ans%4!=0)
			{
				ans=ans+7;
				
			}
			if(ans>n)
			cout<<-1<<endl;
			else
			cout<<n-ans<<endl;
			
		}
		
		
	}
	
	return 0;
	
}
